name: PhoPhlo
description: PhoPhlo is a screening test for early indications of reading troubles, before kids learn to read.
content_security_policy: img-src 'self' https://senhorzinho.iriscouch.com; default-src 'self' https://wentworthinspections.iriscouch.com/ https://senhorzinho.iriscouch.com; script-src 'self' https://senhorzinho.iriscouch.com; connect-src 'self' https://wentworthinspections.iriscouch.com/ https://senhorzinho.iriscouch.com ; object-src 'self' https://senhorzinho.iriscouch.com ; style-src 'self' https://senhorzinho.iriscouch.com;
